# DNS and ARP Recon

## Commands Used
- cat /etc/resolv.conf
- arp -a

## Results
(kali㉿kali)-[~]
└─$ cat /etc/resolv.conf              
# Generated by NetworkManager
search localdomain
nameserver 192.168.109.2
                                                                       
┌──(kali㉿kali)-[~]
└─$ arp -a
? (192.168.109.2) at 00:50:56:ee:fa:35 [ether] on eth0
